item.title: ATHB14-LIKE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05g166400 Gene Symbol: ATHB14-LIKE Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Further analysis revealed that ATHB14-LIKE directly represses transcription of the GA biosynthesis genes GmGA1 and GmGA2, while activating transcription of the GA catabolic gene GIBBERLLIN 2 OXIDASE 2 (GmGA2ox2).

item.title: BnPHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnPHT1|4 Gene Name: PHT1 phosphate transporter Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The high-affinity transporter BnPHT1|4|BnPHT1|4 is involved in phosphorus acquisition and mobilization for facilitating seed germination and early seedling growth of Brassica napus.

item.title: BraA.REF6

item.title: BraRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g017510.3.5C Gene Symbol: BraRGL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Role of BraRGL1 in regulation of Brassica rapa bolting and flowering.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA07g042410.3C Gene Symbol: BrKAO2 Gene Name: Genome: B.

item.title: CiACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g037587m Gene Symbol: CiACS4 Gene Name: Citrus ACC synthase 4 Genome: citrus reference genome Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Citrus ACC synthase CiACS4 regulates plant height by inhibiting gibberellin biosynthesis.

item.title: CiGA20ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiGA20ox1 Gene Name: GA20-oxidase gene 1 Genome: Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Further experiments revealed that the CiACS4–CiERF3 complex can bind to the promoters of 2 citrus GA20-oxidase genes, CiGA20ox1 and CiGA20ox2, and suppress their expression.

item.title: CiGA20ox2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiGA20ox2 Gene Name: GA20-oxidase gene 2 Genome: Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Further experiments revealed that the CiACS4–CiERF3 complex can bind to the promoters of 2 citrus GA20-oxidase genes, CiGA20ox1 and CiGA20ox2, and suppress their expression.

item.title: CmCIB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCIB1 Gene Name: CRYPTOCHROME-INTERACTING bHLH1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The GA-receptor CmGID1B plays an important role in integrating photoperiod information from the CmCIB1-PHR2 complex and plant age from the cmo-miR156-CmSPL3 module to coordinate endogenous GA levels and signal perception.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: GA2oxA9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6A01G221900 Gene Symbol: GA2oxA9|Rht18 Gene Name: GA 2-oxidaseA9 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GA2oxA9|Rht18 is predicted to encode a GA 2-oxidase that metabolizes GA biosynthetic intermediates into inactive products, effectively reducing the amount of bioactive GA (GA1).

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: GmAP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G091300 Gene Symbol: GmAP1a Gene Name: APETALA1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: APETALA1 (AP1) functions as a class A gene in the ABCE model for floral organ development, helping to specify carpel, stamen, petal, and sepal identities.

item.title: GmLHY2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G261800 Gene Symbol: GmLHY2b Gene Name: LATE ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 2 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: LHY2b positively regulates photoperiodic flowering time.

item.title: HvDOF19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvDOF19 Gene Name: dof zinc finger protein19 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The HvDOF19 transcription factor mediates the abscisic acid-dependent repression of hydrolase genes in germinating barley aleurone.

item.title: HvPap-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvPap-1 Gene Name: putative cysteine proteinase precursor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: A cathepsin F-like peptidase involved in barley grain protein mobilization, HvPap-1, is modulated by its own propeptide and by cystatins.

item.title: JcSEP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JcSEP3 Gene Name: SEPALLATA3 Genome: Species: Jatropha curcas Functional Descriptions: An ortholog of the MADS-box gene SEPALLATA3 regulates stamen development in the woody plant Jatropha curcas.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxy-carotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: LsRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lsat_1_v5_gn_2_69481.1 Gene Symbol: LsRGL1 Gene Name: RGA-LIKE1 Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: GA signaling protein LsRGL1 interacts with the abscisic acid signaling-related gene LsWRKY70 to affect the bolting of leaf lettuce.

item.title: LsWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LsWRKY70 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: GA signaling protein LsRGL1 interacts with the abscisic acid signaling-related gene LsWRKY70 to affect the bolting of leaf lettuce.

item.title: MdbHLH162
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1233000 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH162 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdbHLH162 connects the gibberellin and jasmonic acid signals to regulate anthocyanin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdCIPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000320872 Gene Symbol: MdCIPK20 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A protein kinase MdCIPK20 was found to phosphorylate and protect MdRGL2a from degradation, and it was essential for MdRGL2a-promoting anthocyanin accumulation.

item.title: MdRGL2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1264800 Gene Symbol: MdRGL2a Gene Name: DELLA protein Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdSINA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1082000 Gene Symbol: MdSINA1 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.

item.title: MdSINA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1218700 Gene Symbol: MdSINA2 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdRGL2a and MdCIPK20 were ubiquitinated and degraded by E3 ubiquitin ligases MdSINA1 and MdSINA2, respectively, both of which were activated in the presence of GA.
